import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ReferenceLine, ResponsiveContainer, } from 'recharts'; import styles from './Player.module.css' const Player = (props) => { const array = [] const data = props.data?.map(element => { return {name: element.name, cleanSheetsOverall: element.cleanSheetsOverall, cleanSheetsHome: element.cleanSheetsHome, amt: element.amt} }) array.push(props.data) return (
{/* */}
) } export default Player
